page.title: 15LEISURE TIME
page.content: On Fridays I spend my leisure time in the youth club where I can play snooker or play on the television games. There is also table tennis. I buy things at the tuck shop which sells crisps, sweets, and cans of juice. The youth club is a brilliant way to spend your leisure time and it is held in Catterline Primary School. At other times I spend my time playing with my toys in the house and sometimes I help to do the garden. I like to watch television programmes or play about on the grass outside my house. I sometimes go shopping with my mum on Saturdays. Other people sometimes like to go for a cycle run or play down at the shore.
